articles.description: A total of 14 British players, including Emma Raducanu, feature on day one of Wimbledon, with Carlos Alcaraz also beginning his title defence.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 LIVE: Alcaraz, Raducanu & Sabalenka play - watch stream, order of play, scores & updates

articles.description: All the latest transfer news including updates as Chelsea agree a fee with Brighton for forward Joao Pedro plus Phil McNulty's Q&A coming up.
articles.title: Transfer news latest: Chelsea agree fee for Pedro & Phil McNulty Q&A coming up

articles.description: Toulon scrum-half Ben White admits "I haven't stopped shaking" after being called up as an injury replacement for the British and Irish Lions just as he was preparing to play for Scotland on Saturday.
articles.title: Ben White 'hasn't stopped shaking' since late British and Irish Lions call-up

articles.description: Uefa delays a decision on whether Crystal Palace can compete in next season's Europa League.
articles.title: Crystal Palace: Uefa delays decision on club's Europa League fate

articles.description: England's Beth Mead on playing against her girlfriend at Euro 2025 and missing their dog Myle.
articles.title: European Championship 2025: Beth Mead on facing partner Vivianne Miedema at tournament

articles.description: Ian Poulter will face competition from his son Luke for a place at Royal Portrush for the Open Championship, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: The Open final qualifying: Poulter, Westwood & McDowell chasing Royal Portrush spots

articles.description: Lionel Messi signs off from potentially his final game on the global stage with a heavy defeat - but he still shows some magic touches.
articles.title: Lionel Messi: Was that Inter Miami forward's final game on global stage?

articles.description: Lando Norris says his victory in the Austrian Grand Prix was "fulfilling" as he heads into his home race next weekend.
articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix: Lando Norris says win 'gives me good confidence' before Silverstone

articles.description: Wales scrum-half Tomos Williams has been ruled out of the rest of the British and Irish Lions tour of Australia with a hamstring injury
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Tomos Williams ruled out of tour with Ben White called up

articles.description: Manchester City have enjoyed themselves both on and off the pitch in reaching the last-16 of the Club World Cup but the temperature is set to crank up.
articles.title: Club World Cup 2025: Inside Man City's camp after reaching last 16
